attributes.action: Consider employees who completed 5 years in ICT visa to apply for ILR
attributes.additional_details: All the employees who are hardly working under Intra-company transfer (ICT) are playing taxes for 5 years without getting any benefits from the government. These 5 years should be considered to apply ILR like any other work visa holders.
attributes.background: The Government should allow those who have completed 5 years on Intra-company transfer (ICT) visas to apply for Indefinite Leave to Remain (ILR). Currently time on an ICT does not count towards eligibility for ILR.
